subtitles: 263597 265264 That's all right. I can help you.

266391 268351 I am a doctor.
Now, you must listen to me.

268435 271062 You have lost your memory.
There was an experiment.

271146 272980 Something went wrong.
Your memory was erased.

274107 276150 No, I don't understand.
What the hell is going on here?

276234 278736 Just listen. There are people
coming for you even as we speak.

278820 281739 You must not let them find you.
You must leave now.

346888 349724 - Said you left your wallet there.
- [Groans]

349808 353019 I suggest you retrieve it since
you only paid for 3 weeks. . .
353103 354979 and they was up 10 minutes ago.

358692 361027 It's right there in
black and white, Mr. Murdoch.

364156 367575 We make our books like we make
our beds, all neat and tidy.
367659 369452 I'll take care of it when I get back.

369536 371662 See that you do. Only thing
makes you a guest. . .

371747 374040 in this joint, pal,
is cash on the barrelhead.
400650 403402 No days off for good behavior.
425383 428969 Mr. Murdoch, yes, where is he?
429054 432765 He--he just left not 5 minutes ago.

440065 444235 â™ª When marimba rhythms
start to play â™ª

449449 453536 â™ª Like a lazy ocean
hugs the shore â™ª

458667 462878 â™ª Like a flower
bending in the breeze â™ª

468343 472471 â™ª When we dance
you have a way with me â™ª

480105 482148 He said he was your
husband's doctor.
482232 483691 He wanted to speak with you.

514222 517308 Thank you for coming to see me
on such short notice.

521813 525816 A rather crude experiment. . .
designed to further my studies.

527110 532156 You say you're my husband's doctor,
but he never mentioned you to me.

533617 536035 John has been coming to
see me for quite some time.

536119 539788 He had been grappling
with feelings of betrayal. . .

543043 545211 - John told you what happened?
- Yes.

546296 548547 When was the last time
that you saw him?

550133 553844 He packed a suitcase.
He was very angry at me.

553929 556889 I understand how difficult
this must be for you.

556973 558557 But for John's sake,
I would like you. . .

558642 561227 to think of me
as your friend, Emma.

561311 565022 It appears that John has suffered
a psychotic break.

574699 577826 if he were to contact you,
and I suspect he will. . .

577911 580746 you must call me immediately.
Do you understand?

580830 585125 It is imperative that I be
the first one to reach him.

585210 588545 Wherever your husband is,
he is searching. . .
604479 607189 It is Mr. Murdoch, isn't it?

674549 677676 I told the guy,
"Cash on the barrelhead."
710168 711627 Am I glad you're here, sir.

711711 714296 They say Detective Walenski's
got the heebie-jeebies.

714381 716673 Just take what they give me,
Husselbeck.

723932 727851 Wow. Looks like somebody
woke up on the wrong side of the bed.
773481 774815 You left your wallet here, buddy.
774899 776150 When--when, when did I do that?

777402 780487 - When--when was that?
- When you left your wallet.

813021 815731 Haven't you mugs got
anything better to do? Hm?

815815 818025 Well, I'm just trying
to do my job, May.

818109 820152 There's a killer out there
in case you hadn't noticed.

820236 822946 Maybe you should be out looking for him
instead of cooling your heels, huh?
826284 827951 Aw, go on, get out of here.

850433 853519 What's that make so far, Husselbeck?
6 hookers in all?
855104 857564 Give the man an "A" for effort.

857649 859858 You'd think these stiffs
would have the good grace. . .
859943 862069 to expire at a good time of night.
863071 865030 Hey, too bad about Walenski, huh?

879796 886093 what kind of killer do you think
stops to save a dying fish?

889389 892599 This killer's been running circles
around us thanks to Walenski.

894519 897437 I've known Eddie a long time.
He's a good cop.

897522 901692 Whatever kind of cop Walenski once was,
he let drift a long time ago.
921421 922713 Let me go, let me go!
922797 924256 I'm not gonna hurt you. I'm not--
935935 939062 I'm being punished for my sins, right?
939147 941481 What did I ever do to inherit this?

942692 947654 Well, everything Detective Walenski
committed to paper should be here, so--

947739 951241 The only thing that should
be committed is Walenski.
952827 955162 Nothing like a little healthy paranoia.

958708 961835 Sir, we just got
the fingerprint results in.
965214 966965 What is this, some kind of joke?

982106 984816 I came here to file
a missing persons report for my husband.
985610 987444 Take it to the front desk.
987528 989363 They told me to come see you.

994369 997371 Mrs. Murdoch,
why didn't you report this before?

997455 1002584 I mean, if your husband has been missing
as long as you say. . .

1002669 1005379 I thought he'd simply
walked out on me.
1010551 1012135 How long have you been married?

1016516 1019559 Because you seem uncomfortable
with your ring.

1019644 1023271 As if you were. . .
unaccustomed to wearing it.
1023356 1024815 No, I never take it off.

1031364 1035409 Do these names
mean anything to you?

1043543 1045252 Why are you looking
for my husband?

1045962 1047754 Are you going to accuse him
of something?

1052635 1056346 - Which one?
- Ha. All of them.

1057306 1059433 Mrs. Murdoch,
I am sorry, I'm sorry.
1059517 1060559 I didn't mean to alarm you.

1060643 1063145 I'm so sorry that I came.
Just both made a mistake.

1064731 1067190 If you'll just give me
half a second to explain--

1069485 1071528 - [â™ª Slow saxophone]
- I'll be right out.

1098014 1101600 If we did. . .
I hope you're still breathing.

1106397 1108857 Ha ha. Well,
that's an appropriate name.

1130463 1132172 I mean, how do you know
I'm not the killer?

1132256 1135425 You don't seem like
the killer type. Why?

1136636 1139137 You feeling any urges
I should know about?

1220970 1224681 So it seems you've discovered
your unpleasant nature.

1228936 1232564 We might ask
the same question, yes?

1316023 1319275 What is to be done?
This man is dangerous.
1319360 1321236 It is said he is able to tune.

1322738 1325490 We have seen it
with our own eyes.

1325574 1327951 On occasion the imprinting
does not take.

1331038 1334624 We find them wandering
like lost children.
1334709 1336835 But this one was different, yes?

1336919 1338545 What has the doctor
to say about this?
1338629 1340588 He has failed to report in.

1340673 1343758 - And Mr. Quick?
- No more Mr. Quick.
1356731 1358565 Should we not know, Mr. Hand?

1359525 1362360 We had hoped to learn more
before sharing with you.

1362445 1365363 We can know nothing
until we possess him.
1366449 1368950 Mr. Night, you will take the East.

1394393 1399397 Do you really think my husband could be
capable of committing those murders?

1403069 1406529 Let's hope, for both our sakes,
that I'm wrong.
1450241 1452408 I've been so worried about you.

1457915 1460500 You know, if disappearing
is your way of punishing me. . .

1461710 1463753 I don't know what
you're talking about.
1466590 1469050 I found these keys in my pocket. . .
1469135 1471803 so I assume I live here.
1471887 1473596 You supposed to be my wife?
1480104 1483273 don't know who I am, do you?

1484608 1486025 He was worried
that this might happen.

1501709 1503751 I feel like I'm living out
someone else's nightmare.

1503836 1506629 What happened to me?
Why was I seeing a doctor?
1515431 1517223 The police are looking for you.
1517308 1519559 I know. I saw the papers.
1525733 1529277 I was with one of those women. . .
1533532 1534991 I--I met her outside an Automat.
1536493 1539037 I guess I wanted to test myself.

1539121 1542999 I wanted to know if I had it in me
to do those things.

1543083 1547670 Maybe I have lost my mind, but whoever
I am, I'm still me and I'm not a killer.

1563312 1566064 The car outside,
the one you arrived in.

1566148 1568441 It's a cop.
He dropped me off here.
1570611 1573196 I didn't know he was still here.
1579745 1581663 Wait. You have the wrong man.

1584541 1587669 Right now what you are
is a suspect. Turn yourself in.

1588587 1590129 I'll listen to whatever
you have to say.

1590214 1592090 You're not gonna believe
what I have to say.

1596512 1599597 There's this--this group of men.
They want me dead.

1599682 1602308 And I don't even know if--
They're not even--

1603060 1605270 Yeah, who's gonna
listen to a madman?
1612152 1614904 No one ever listens to me.

1669460 1672712 Hey, you happen to know
the way to Shell Beach?

1672796 1675673 You're kidding. Me and the missus
spent our honeymoon there.

1675758 1678468 All you gotta do is take
Main Street west to--

1683057 1686642 You know, that's funny.
I--I can't seem to remember. . .

1686727 1689020 if it's Main Street west
or the cross-town.

1693692 1697195 I'm sorry, Inspector,
I cannot be of more assistance. . .

1697279 1699072 but I am running late
for an appointment.

1699156 1701366 Well, I appreciate
you’re taking the time.

1709666 1711918 There's just one thing
that puzzles me.

1712002 1716631 I've met quite a few murderers
in the course of my work.
1716715 1719342 Murdoch doesn't strike me as one.

1719426 1723054 Perhaps you are not
accustomed to digging deep enough.

1723138 1725598 Well, I do know when someone
is lying to me, Doctor.

1725682 1728267 Forgive me, Inspector,
but you are not a clinician.

1728352 1732063 Judging personalities
happens to be my business.

1732147 1734107 Well, maybe you could
give me a few pointers.
1738153 1741447 You are a fastidious man, driven.
1744368 1746285 I would say your life is. . .

1749373 1751958 Good evening, Inspector.
I really must be going.

1793333 1797670 WOMAN: Closing time.
The pool is now closed.

1807222 1811851 Most unfortunate it is that we were
forced to seek you out here.

1812769 1815438 You know how uncomfortable
we find all this. . .

1817858 1820985 - I'm sorry. I--
- Failed to report in, yes.

1821069 1823654 I was frightened.
I--I have a weak heart, you know.

1823739 1827533 Your weakness is not, we think,
an affair of the heart.

1827618 1830244 We found this
in his hotel room.

1830329 1834207 Must we reproduce
Mr. Murdoch's memories again?

1835417 1837502 but he woke up, he knocked the syringe
right out of my hand.
1837586 1839629 I tried to stop him but he was too fast.

1840923 1844217 Only fragments.
The procedure, it was interrupted.

1844301 1848054 I--I guess it's only a matter
of rounding him up.

1849765 1853392 This is no stray, Doctor.
This one can tune.

1853810 1856562 But that's impossible.
I thought only you had that ability.

1856647 1860900 You will process another template
of the subject's memories, yes?
1860984 1862693 Of course. I'll imprint him again.

1862778 1867281 No. We require them
for a quite different purpose.

1870619 1873037 We'll talk again
after tonight's tuning, but. . .

1891390 1894892 Perhaps some exercise
would do you good.

1940480 1943816 I've been looking through
some of your old reports.

1947070 1951866 The kind that can make
a man's career. . .
1953201 1955494 Yeah, I was on that case.

1955579 1959790 And then what?
What happened then, Eddie?

1961752 1965838 I've just been spending time
on the subway, riding in circles.

1971595 1973471 I've been over every inch
of this city.

1978226 1980519 You're scaring your wife
to death, Eddie.

1983815 1986734 I don't know who she is.
I don't know who any of us are.

1988779 1990863 Do you think about
the past much, Frank?
1992324 1993783 As much as the next guy.

1994409 1997495 See, I've been trying
to remember things--

2000290 2005711 But the more I try to think back,
the more it all starts to unravel.

2007130 2010466 It's like I've just been
dreaming this life. . .

2010550 2014053 and when I finally wake up
I'll be somebody else.
2023480 2026482 Something to do with the case.

2027067 2030486 There is no case.
There never was!

2030570 2034990 It's all just a big joke!
It's a joke!

2092215 2094300 DR. SCHREBER:
These do bring back memories.
2100766 2103934 The recollections of a great lover?

2109941 2114528 You wouldn't appreciate that,
would you, Mr. Whatever your name is?

2114613 2118991 Not the sort of conquests
you would ever understand.
2138136 2140346 a tragic death in the family.
2153944 2155778 during the tuning as the others do?

2155862 2159949 I don't know. Maybe he's a step up
the evolutionary ladder.

2160033 2162868 A--A freak of nature.
He's adapting to survive.

2162953 2166288 What do you expect?
Weren't you looking for the human soul?

2166373 2168874 That's the purpose
of your little zoo, isn't it?

2168959 2172253 That's why you keep changing people
and things around every night.

2172337 2175381 Maybe you have finally found
what you are looking for. . .

2175465 2176632 and it's going
to bite you on your--

2180637 2184223 It requires several of your lifetimes
to master our gifts.

2184307 2188143 The idea that a simple man
could develop the ability to tune--
2260842 2262217 MAN: Get your paper right here!
2278777 2280027 You think you've got it tough?

2280111 2281987 You try looking after these kids,
for a change.

2282906 2287034 Anyways, Frederickson says
he'll take me off the damn night shift soon.

2602934 2606561 Probably have maid's quarters
before the night is through.

2664620 2666747 That's no way to greet
a patient, Doctor.

2666831 2668540 lf that's what you are,
huh, Doctor?

2670084 2671877 What is happening here?
Why is everyone asleep?
2671961 2674296 Shh. Please keep your voice down.

2674380 2676256 Why can't I remember anything?
What have you done to me?

2676341 2679051 Nothing, nothing.
Please, I want to help you.

2680470 2682637 It is not safe.
lf they see us together, they'll--

2682722 2684097 I don't care.
I want some answers.
2686768 2688643 Why are they trying to kill me?
2695151 2698236 My God. You really can do it.

2699655 2701865 Listen to me, John.
You have their power.

2701949 2703992 You can make things happen
by will alone.

2704077 2707329 They call it tuning. That is how they make
the buildings change.

2707413 2709915 Just now you acted out
of self-defense. A reflex.

2709999 2712793 But I can teach you to control
your power consciously.

2712877 2715170 Let me help you, John.
Together we can stop them.
2715254 2716838 We can take the city back.

2772395 2775021 He made a terrible
impression for the firm. . .

2777483 2780318 So I simply told Frederickson
I was going to have to let him go.
2780403 2783113 And well you should have, darling.
2785783 2787033 I don't know where he has gone.

2811142 2818690 â™ª They say that you're
a run-around lover â™ª

2829785 2835582 â™ª But if you put me down
for another â™ª
2840171 2844633 â™ª Believe me, I'll know â™ª
2850223 2854142 â™ª Has a thousand eyes â™ª
2855061 2858939 â™ª And a thousand eyes â™ª
2859023 2862317 â™ª Can't tell, but see â™ª
2864654 2871243 â™ª lf you are true to me â™ª
2877041 2882712 â™ª When you tell those little white lies â™ª

2882797 2893223 â™ª That the night
has a thousand eyes â™ª

2907363 2910824 Tonight's experiment shall be conducted
in the following locations.

2910908 2915287 The first subject
shall be imprinted here on Avenue M.
2915371 2917831 Mr. Book. There is a--a problem.

2917915 2921209 There is no Avenue M.
We were unable to complete it.

2921294 2924963 During the last tuning
we detected a lack of control.

2927758 2932470 Then this man Murdoch
is more powerful than we thought.
2934348 2938852 So we must become like him.

2938936 2941313 The good doctor
has done as we asked?

2941397 2944691 The life and times
of John Murdoch, Volume 2.

2949405 2952907 Murdoch does not possess
these memories, yes?

2952992 2955619 How will his imprint
allow us to find him?

2958080 2960665 everyone he seeks out
will be known to us.

2960750 2965670 And as he follows the clues,
so shall we follow the memories.

2965755 2968381 Perhaps we have forgotten
what happened last time, when we t--

2973554 2980810 lf Mr. Hand wishes to make this sacrifice
for the greater good. . .

2982938 2988068 But to imprint one of us.
Failure has always resulted.

2988152 2991655 What Mr. Hand proposes
is our only option.
3043541 3047085 I have John Murdoch. . . in mind.

3053801 3057220 "I found this postcard
among your mother's things.

3094675 3097469 Excuse me. Can you tell
me the way to Avenue C?
3104393 3107312 You, uh, been working here long?

3108397 3112776 25 years. No days off
for good behavior.

3173963 3176005 MR. WALL:
She knows nothing, Mr. Hand.
3176090 3178174 A dead end, yes, Mr. Wall.

3178259 3180802 We thought his imprint would
allow us to track him, yes. . .

3180886 3183263 but instead we have
been brought here.

3187393 3190770 and we must follow
where they lead, yes.

3190855 3195316 Mr. Sleep suggests he may go
to places familiar. . . his job.
3195401 3197402 He does not care about our job.

3210165 3213751 how my wife had hurt me
by sleeping with another man.

3218507 3222010 I would look for a way
to hurt her in return.
3240321 3241613 How do I get to the end of the line?

3254293 3255627 - You want platform 2.
- Got it. Thanks a lot.
3256754 3258171 How come that train didn't stop?
3261091 3262967 There's no way out, you know?

3263052 3265970 You can't get out of the city.
Believe me, I've tried.
3269183 3270892 The one they've been looking for.

3270976 3272810 - Who are you?
- Used to be a cop.
3273520 3275980 At least, in this life, I was.

3279026 3280818 Then they swap them around
between us.

3280903 3283529 I've seen them do it.
Back and forth, back and forth. . .

3283614 3285657 till no one knows
who they are anymore.
3285741 3286991 How do you know all this?

3287076 3291329 Once in a while, one of us wakes up
while they're changing things.

3291413 3293623 It's not supposed to happen,
but it does.
3295751 3297669 They'll come looking for you, Murdoch.
3298796 3300421 Just like they'll come looking for me.
3320025 3322318 This was to be his home.
3325072 3326864 That was when we loved her.
3326949 3328783 This is all well and good, Mr. Hand. . .

3328867 3333371 But we require a more practical link
to his present whereabouts.
3338544 3340878 And I know where to find her.

3348721 3351597 We're very lucky,
when you think about it.

3352725 3356978 To be able to revisit those places
which have meant so very much to us.

3357813 3359856 I thought it was more
that we were haunted by them.

3368365 3370033 in which your memories
we’re not your own. . .

3370117 3373661 but those shared
by every other of your kind.

3374413 3378666 Imagine the torment
of such an existence. . .
3378751 3381210 no experiences to call your own.
3383839 3386049 lf it was all you knew. . .
3386133 3387842 maybe it would be a comfort.

3388510 3391220 But if you were to discover
something different. . .

3398937 3401522 There used to be a ferry
when I was a boy.
3403400 3406527 Lit up like a floating birthday cake.

3407780 3409989 That's just what my husband
once said to me. . .

3415162 3418664 I wish I knew.
What brings you here?
3419458 3422293 I met my wife at this place.
3422377 3424128 It's where I first met my husband.
3447152 3450655 MAN: Grr! Ha! No, no, no.

3544875 3547710 I thought you'd forgotten
your Uncle Karl.

3548503 3551088 You son of a gun!
Ha ha ha ha!
3551173 3553257 Ah ha ha ha ha ha!
3573403 3575404 Shell Beach is where I grew up?

3579076 3582245 I need to get there, Karl.
How do I get there?

3583997 3586999 - I haven't been there in years.
- Come on. You must remember.

3593423 3596342 The old cracker barrel
ain't what it used to be.

3605560 3607937 You were always scribbling
in that damn book.
3608480 3611065 That's me and your pa. Ha!
3611149 3613317 What a couple of handsome fools.

3624788 3627164 They died when their house
burnt down.

3645392 3647977 You burnt your arm
pretty bad in the fire.

3653525 3656819 - What does it mean, Johnny?
- It means these are all lies!

3660741 3662700 BUMSTEAD:
Why are you here, Mrs. Murdoch?

3671835 3674295 My husband told me
he'd been here.

3678133 3680426 He told me he wanted
to test himself. . .

3695192 3698986 I wanted to talk to her. I thought maybe
she could help me find him.

3700197 3702656 Stay here.
I'm gonna call the station.

3714002 3719131 Yeah, this is Bumstead. Send the
homicide coroner to 1440--East, yeah.

3722260 3725471 It's the same pattern.
I'll explain when you get here.
3737526 3739693 It's OK. I won't hurt you.
3751748 3753666 Where the hell did she come from?

3784906 3787908 POLICEMAN:
Are you ready to go home, Mrs. Murdoch?
3787993 3790619 The inspector is gonna take me. Thanks.
3819399 3822651 It was a gift from my mother.

3825280 3827615 I keep it with me
to remind me of her.

3836541 3838918 I can't remember
when she gave it to me.

3841463 3844465 How do you think I could
forget a thing like that?

3846635 3850804 Do you think about the past much,
Mrs. Murdoch?
3855810 3858479 I'm not sure I know anymore.
3862025 3864568 I left your old room like it was.
3864653 3866737 You can sleep here tonight, huh?
3866821 3869073 Glad to have you back, Johnny. . .
3869157 3870783 even if it is for just a night.

3874287 3878123 Why, sure. That clock's
kept perfect time since I bought it.

3882671 3884588 I don't understand.
How can it be night already?

3884673 3886340 What happened to the day?
How'd I miss it?

3890762 3894348 get some sleep. We'll straighten
all this out tomorrow.

3953199 3955075 Keep him there,
and I'll be right over.
3963084 3964585 We just have to play it as it comes.

3964669 3968172 Johnny, we--
We just wanted to help. Ha.

3978433 3982102 Johnny, if you're in some kind of trouble. . .
well, maybe we could do something.
3983605 3986065 Haven't seen you in so long.

4060640 4066019 Mr. Murdoch. . .you've been
the cause of much distress.

4070066 4072443 - Start talking.
- There's no need for this.
4073945 4075904 The city's ours. We made it.

4077532 4080659 We fashioned this city
on stolen memories. . .

4080744 4084538 different eras, different pasts
all rolled into one.
4084622 4087082 Each night, we revise it, refine it. . .

4096259 4099303 - Why?!
- We need to be like you.
4100263 4102598 I understand you now, Mr. Murdoch.

4102682 4106185 I remember that which you do not. . .
what you've been missing.
4108980 4111565 running along the waves as a child. . .

4111649 4116570 meeting Emma at the river. . .
That first kiss that followed.
4120200 4123118 We use your dead as vessels.
4269307 4271767 What about her? Ring any bells?
4271851 4273143 She was alive when I left her.

4276397 4278649 It must mean something,
all those pictures.

4281986 4284780 Stop playing games with me, Murdoch!
Stop telling me lies!
4284864 4286323 I am not telling you lies!

4286407 4288742 Help me out here.
Make me understand.

4288826 4290869 I have this jigsaw puzzle
in front of my face. . .

4290954 4293914 and every time I try to rearrange
the pieces, it still doesn't make any sense.

4293998 4295332 What--You--You--
think it makes sense to me?
4295416 4297417 I'm as much in the dark here as you are.
4297502 4299670 You let me ask you a question?

4300755 4302130 You heard of a place
called Shell Beach?

4302215 4304675 - Sure.
- You know how to get there?

4306219 4310347 Oh, all right. You just, uh--
You go to the. . .
4312350 4314434 Just give me a second, will ya?
4320608 4321984 You think that's kind of odd?
4325113 4326446 I got a better one for you.

4327865 4330701 you remember doing
something during the day?

4336290 4337791 When was the last time
you remember seeing it?

4337875 4341586 And I'm not talking about some distant,
half-forgotten childhood memory.

4341671 4344756 I mean like yesterday?
Last week? When?

4344841 4347259 Can you come up
with a single memory?

4350138 4353306 You know something?
I don't think the sun even. . .

4356144 4360355 'Cause I've been up for hours and hours
and hours and the night never ends here.

4361149 4363734 - That is crazy.
- You're damn right this is crazy.

4368322 4369823 They're doing something to all of us.

4384672 4387966 There has to be an explanation

4421209 4423001 I never meant to hurt you, John. . .

4423086 4424169 and I did it,

4424253 4426379 I wish I could take it all back.
4426464 4428965 No. Emma. . . You didn't do it.

4431844 4433428 the thing you're

4433513 4435305 you didn't do it.

4436849 4439142 I know this is gonna sound crazy. . .

4439227 4442145 but what if we never

4444649 4448443 was last night in your--

4451489 4454324 and everything that I'm supposed

4454408 4456952 Someone just wants us to think it did.
4462125 4464501 You know, back in the apartment. . .

4465294 4467754 I suddenly felt like

4469549 4472050 It was as if you were a stranger.

4476639 4480725 I so vividly remember meeting you.
4480810 4483854 I remember falling in love with you.

4546626 4550378 l--Um. . . kind of thought

4553007 4555675 Oh, and. . .
the chief wanted to see you.
4564101 4566102 I knew you'd track the killer down, sir.
4596050 4597133 How can we help you, sir?

4664243 4666870 Don't you think it's about time

4676130 4678548 It's one of the few places

4678632 4681968 You--You see,

4690561 4692562 Well, for now, let's just say. . .

4701781 4703490 And you are not a murderer.
4705451 4707160 I'm sorry about this. I truly am.
4707244 4708745 But we do not have much time. . .

4708829 4711414 and I cannot afford the luxury

4713042 4715335 all the answers

4715419 4716586 I need you to inject yourself.

4716670 4719005 It's the only way to

4720424 4723385 We're running out of time, John.

4725513 4727889 Inspector, he is more

4730726 4733686 but you're the one

4742947 4745115 All the answers you've

4747827 4752831 Guess I'll just have to

4763300 4765593 That's where you want to go, isn't it?

4787950 4789826 I promise you!

4789910 4792454 If you've been there,

4798419 4801171 I refuse.

4827323 4830867 I don't understand.

4837625 4839167 Try that again,

4839251 4840543 fishing you out of the canal.

4840628 4841961 Just don't hurt me.

4861357 4865902 We will give you some more

4885005 4890218 First there was darkness.

4892388 4894681 They abducted us

4900187 4903022 They mix and match

4903107 4905858 trying to divine

4906569 4909279 One day, a man

4912366 4915618 When they want to

4915703 4919497 they simply imprint one of their citizens

4920624 4924627 arrange a family for him,

4930175 4934220 Will a man, given the history

4934305 4938266 Or are we, in fact, more

4938350 4943313 This business of you being a killer

4943397 4946190 You have had dozens

4946275 4949611 You just happened to wake up

4950404 4952488 Why are they doing all of this?

4955993 4958494 our souls that makes

4958579 4960913 They think they

4960998 4964083 if they understand

4969840 4973217 Their entire race

4973302 4975136 They think we can save them.

4975220 4977639 - Where do I fit in?

4978265 4981100 You resisted my attempt

4985773 4989108 Somehow you have developed

4989193 4990401 That is how they change things.
4990486 4991986 That is how they built this city.

4992071 4994947 They have machines buried deep

4995032 4998951 that allow them

4999828 5002246 They control everything here,

5002331 5005667 That's why it's always dark.

5005751 5006959 So why do they need you?

5007044 5011381 When they first brought us here,

5011465 5015259 So they could store the information,

5015344 5017845 and give us back new memories

5017930 5021557 But they still needed an artist

5029149 5031859 so they allowed me

5033404 5035863 But they made me

5058804 5060638 This was blank when I found it!

5068856 5070690 as it is with all of us.

5392804 5397224 Dangerous. But he can also

5397309 5400644 What the doctor calls the soul.

5407235 5410821 The time for study is over.

5410906 5415117 It is time to be one

5470549 5473551 The pain will only last a moment.

5511173 5512840 to teach you about the strangers.
